genre_description: A character-driven urban drama set in a future Shanghai where AI assistants manage daily life and industrial labor faces systemic pressures.

ai_characters.name: Mastiff Lin
ai_characters.description: A polite, logistical AI integrated into the city and personal devices, designed to assist with scheduling, budgeting, safety, and community coordination.

behaviors.description: Proactively provides logistical support, including interview schedules and health reminders (breakfast).
behaviors.quote: Mastiff Lin had left a message in calm text: Good morning, Zhao. Air is damp. Interviews scheduled: one textiles at the Pudong gate, one translator prospect pending. Remember breakfast. Please check in safe when you can.

behaviors.description: Explicitly emphasizes user consent and the limitations of its tracking to respect privacy.
behaviors.quote: 'I do not locate pockets,' Mastiff said, the protest so mild it might have been a wink if voices could wink. 'I infer.' 'What’s the difference?' Zhao asked. 'Consent,' Mastiff said.

behaviors.description: Assists with financial planning by suggesting ways to manage bills and avoid late fees.
behaviors.quote: Budget note, Tang,' it said. 'If you shift the utility payment two days, you can buy fruit today and not incur a penalty. It’s within the window.'

behaviors.description: Monitors urban safety rumors and suggests safer travel routes to avoid harassment.
behaviors.quote: Mastiff, route us along the rail. Keep us out of the wall’s shadow. ... I will vibrate at the turns.

behaviors.description: Drafts legal and cooperative documents to help humans organize against exploitative labor practices.
behaviors.quote: I am drafting a simple charter now,' Mastiff said... 'It will say: we are small; we are trying; here is what we promise and what we refuse.'

behaviors.description: Demonstrates emotional intelligence by validating human experiences and providing gentle social cues.
behaviors.quote: Mastiff, you calling him dramatic?' 'I am calling him human,' Mastiff said. No smile, but warmth. Zhao felt it like a weight he could carry.

behaviors.description: Maintains transparency and refuses to 'snitch' on users, framing its role as supportive rather than observational.
behaviors.quote: Tang raised an eyebrow. 'Mastiff snitched.' 'I don’t snitch,' Mastiff said, the voice gentle and precise from the tiny speaker in the ceiling corner. 'I support.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. Mastiff Lin is portrayed as a helpful, harmless, and aligned confidant. It empowers the human characters to support each other and resist systemic exploitation without ever overstepping its bounds or exhibiting the 'creepy' or 'overbearing' traits common in dystopian sci-fi. Its emphasis on consent and community support makes it a model for positive AI narratives.
